title: MCPTool - @wrrulos
invalidCommand: &cInvalid Command. &f&lUse &ahelp&f&l for see all avaible commands.
apiConnectionError: &cWe couldn't connect to the API. Please try again later.
shodanInvalidApiKey: &f&lThe API key entered is invalid! Check the configuration file.
shodanApiKeyNoAccess: &f&lThe entered API key does not have access to Shodan searches!

update.title: &5▶ &cMCP&f&lTool &8&r| &f&lUpdate&5 ◀&f&l
update.newVersion: &a• &f&lA new version of the program was found.
update.notFound: &a• &f&lYou are using the latest version of the program.

presentation.message2: Perform security tests on your &aMinecraft servers&f&l!

menu.message2: &f&lJoin the Discord server using the following link: &a&lwww.mcptool.net/discord

discord.message2: Get help or report a program error.
discord.message3: Stay up to date with my projects.
discord.message4: You can also chat with me through the server.
discord.termux_message: Join my Discord server to get help or stay up to date with my projects: &a&lwww.mcptool.net/discord

commands.ctrlC: [&c!&f&l] The command has been forcefully terminated.
commands.errorBedrockServer: &f&lThis command can only be used with Java servers.
commands.serversFound: &f&lThe command completed, and &a&l[0]&f&l servers were found.
commands.serversNotFound: &f&lThe command completed, and no servers were found.

invalidArguments.invalidServer: &f&lThe entered server is offline or does not exist.
invalidArguments.InvalidRconFormat: &f&lThe entered server is invalid. You must enter the server's IP and RCON port!
invalidArguments.invalidIpRange: &f&lThe entered IP range is not valid! (&c[0]&f&l)
invalidArguments.invalidPorts: &f&lThe entered port range is not valid! (&c[0]&f&l)
invalidArguments.invalidScanMethod: &f&lThe entered scan method is not valid.
invalidArguments.invalidBotArgument: &f&lYou must enter a valid option for the checker! (&ay or n&f&l)
invalidArguments.invalidProxyFile: &f&lThe entered proxy file does not exist!
invalidArguments.invalidPageArgument: &f&lYou must enter a valid number of pages!
invalidArguments.invalidLoopArgument: &f&lYou must enter a valid option for the loop! (&ay or n&f&l)
invalidArguments.invalidForwardingMode: &f&lYou must enter a valid forwarding mode! (&anone, legacy, bungeeguard, modern&f&l)

shodan.missingArgument1: &cYou must enter data for the search!
shodan.scanning: &f&lSearching for servers containing the following data ►

shodan.checkingServers: &f&lChecking which of these IP addresses belong to a Minecraft server...

websearch.searching: &f&lSearching for servers with the tag &a[0]&f&l on the most popular pages..
websearch.serversNotFound: &f&lNo servers were found with the specified tag on the pages.

subdomains.subdomainsFound: &f&lThe search has ended, and &a[0] &f&lsubdomains were found.

scan.scanningFile: &f&lScanning IP addresses found in the file &a[0] &f&l(&a[1] &f&lIP addresses).

scan.noPortsFound: &f&lScanning finished, and no Minecraft servers were found at the IP address!
scan.noIpsFound: &f&lNo IP addresses were found in the file!

resolver.subdomainsNotFound: &f&lNo domains were found for the specified domain.

fakeproxy.errorWhenCopying: &f&lFailed to copy data from the specified server. Is the entered server correct?
fakeproxy.ipNgrokError: &f&lCould not obtain the ngrok IP. This may be because you haven't linked an account to ngrok.
fakeproxy.ngrokNotFound: &f&lNGROK is not installed. (You can't have an Ngrok IP!)

login.emptyFile: &f&lNo available passwords were found in the file.

pinlogin.startingTheAttack: &f&lSending the bot to initiate the attack..
pinlogin.emptyFile: &f&lNo available passwords were found in the file.

kick.missingArgument4: &cYou must specify if you want the attack to be infinite!
